Detailed Description

Positions a content layer relative to some anchor point in a reference layer.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithAnchorLayer: (CPLayer *)  newAnchorLayer  

Initializes a newly allocated CPLayerAnnotation object with the provided reference layer.

This is the designated initializer. The initialized layer will be anchored to CPRectAnchor::CPRectAnchorTop by default.

Parameters:
newAnchorLayer The reference layer.
Returns:
The initialized CPLayerAnnotation object.
